sentences.sContent: Some enterprising students are designing software.
sentences.sCn: 一些有创业精神的学生在设计软件。

sentences.sContent: an enterprising scheme to provide interest-free loans
sentences.sCn: 一项提供无息贷款的创业计划

synos.tran: 有事业心的；有进取心的；有魄力的；有胆量的

phrases.pCn: 进取心，进取精神；创业精神

words.tran: 企业；事业；进取心；事业心

trans.tranCn: 有事业心的, 有进取心的
trans.tranOther: having the ability to think of new activities or ideas and make them work
